Description:
Stunning ex-display on 683sqm
Integrating modern family living with spacious internal dimensions, this glamorous ex-display home presents a luxurious haven for the fastidious family buyer with multiple living zones, quality finishes and appointments complimented by the glorious outdoor entertaining space.
- 4 robed bedrooms, 2 bathrooms plus double garage
- Exquisite master with walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite
- Sparkling family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry
- Formal lounge with glorious high ceiling and plantation shutters
- Kitchen with stone benches and 900mm appliances and dishwasher
- Rich chocolate toned floorboards to open plan meals and family room
- Alfresco entertaining deck with dining pavilion and adjoining backyard
- Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm and video intercom
Proudly placed only a stone's throw from parkland, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne train station, buses, plus Cranbourne Royal Botanic Gardens, close to Lighthouse Christian College and Cranbourne Primary.

Address: 18 Yellow Robin Circuit Cranbourne East VIC 3977
Description:
Near-new luxury and a lifestyle of fun, fulfilment and community in Casey Fields
Glistening with the clean, crisp feel of near-newness, this beautiful four-bedroom home offers more than just family space and luxury, but a vibrant family lifestyle. Idyllically positioned within the coveted Casey Fields Estate, enjoy life the way its meant to be lived, amid endless recreation, sporting grounds and the Cranbourne Racecourse, while footsteps from cosy cafes, delicious eateries, and daily shopping at the new Clyde and Casey Shopping Centres.
Offering instant kerbside appeal beyond pristine landscaped gardens, the home enjoys an immediately warm and welcoming ambience, tastefully dressed in a palette of modern neutral colours. Lustrous timber flooring meanders through the home, enriched by quality fixtures and fittings, while cocooned in the comfort of ducted heating and cooling. A formal sitting room or home office offers relaxing privacy, while an open plan domain hosts friends and family, spilling onto an alfresco patio for barbecue enjoyment. Topped in gleaming stone, the kitchen delivers easy practicality with 900mm appliances among its abundant gloss cabinetry.
Complete with four robed bedrooms including ensuite and walk-in robe amenities to the master bedroom, plus a remote double garage, enjoy the comfort of nothing more to do than live an enticing lifestyle in this fabulous locale with everything at your fingertips.
IN CONJUNCTION WITH | OBRIEN REAL ESTATE | JOSEPH FERNAND 0403 699 314

Description:
A Beautiful, Young and Spacious Home!
This is no ordinary 4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms, double garage home...this is an extraordinary, cleverly designed, fresh, sleek and modern home!
Whether you are just getting into the market, upgrading for your growing family or buying an investment property, this is where your search ends. This Simonds built house located in the beautiful pocket of "Casey Fields Estate" has all the stylish features and space that suits your needs..
Modern styled frontage nestled amongst manicured landscaped gardens. Step into a spacious entrance with plenty of natural light, carpeted master bedroom to the left with walk in robe and en-suite. Flashy beige tinted tiles along the hall way leads you to an open lounge area with plantations shutters. The open plan kitchen comes with plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances including 900mm gas cook top oven, dishwasher. An islander bench top with a double sink and cupboard storage, adjoining dining that co exists with wide windows to enlighten the kitchen and dining area.
Three bedrooms with carpet and double built in robes. Energy efficient led down lights throughout, a double car lock-up garage with remote access. Two-separate entertainment areas onlooking dining and living area to enjoy the sun inside and outside the house. Save money on electricity bills with the 5 kw solar panels with evaporative cooling and ducted heating throughout this magnificent 27 sq. (approx) home.
Conveniently located to shops, transport, schools and sporting fields and being only 3 years young...This wont last long - call Me Now to avoid disappointment!

Description:
Space for family living
This premium Porter Davis home is quality flowing over a single level with highlights including sunken lounge and high ceiling throughout. Timber decking leading you to the front entrance, welcoming you over gleaming tiles. Exceptional planning inside maximises space to result in a formal and casual living areas.
With an abundance of features as follows:
- Stunning designed kitchen with stone bench tops and colourful splashback.
- Four good sized bedrooms plus study.
- Evaporative cooling and ducted heating.
- 4 living areas including theatre room equipped with projector and screen.
- Quality floor covering.
- DLUG with remote and rear access.
- And many more.
Situated in Cranbourne East, right in the middle of 2 shopping centers – Hunt Club Shopping Centre and Selandra Rise Shopping Centre. Minutes away from Hunt Club Wetland, walking and bicycle paths as well as a complete range of childcare, primary (Cranbourne East Primary) and secondary schools (Cranbourne East Secondary College)

Description:
Invest or Nest
Located in one of the most popular estate of Cranbourne East, Hunt Club offers plenty of space to explore with several parks and playgrounds within walking distance. With Canbourne East Primary, Secondary college, Hunt Club Shopping centre, public transport just at the door steps this amazing property must be on your wish list. Featuring:
- Three bedrooms, master bedroom with full en-suite & BIR's, other two bedrooms both with BIR's
- Spacious kitchen with gas cook top, 600 mm stainless steel appliance, plenty of cupboard and bench space
- Family bathroom and a separate toilet.
- Spacious rear yard with plenty of space for kids and pets to play.
- Single lock up garage with rear roller door for access to the backyard plus an internal door into the living area.
- Extras include: Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, dishwasher etc
A great buy for those who are looking for a small house to move in or even as an investment property.
Don't delay and call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 to book in an inspection.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE EAST: If you are looking to buy a home in a great location that has easy access to all that The Hunt Club has to offer then 4 Monmouth Road needs to be seen to be appreciated!
With a functional, free flowing floor plan the property itself features 4 generous bedrooms. The master offers a WIR and a FES. The balance of the bedrooms all have BIR and nearby to the family bathroom with separate bath and shower facilities.
The hostess kitchen is the central hub of the home and is finished with a good amount of cupboard and bench space, tiled splash back, S/S appliances including oven, gas cook top, rangehood and whitegoods dishwasher.
Take advantage of the separate living zones making year-round formal and informal entertaining a breeze! Relax with a good movie or a book with the front living area or some carefree day to day living with family in the great sized kitchen meals area.
Added internal extras are gas ducted heating, S/S air con, fresh neutral tones throughout and finished off with a mixture of tiles and new carpet throughout.
Step outside and be greeted by a sensational street scape offering a modern facade and landscaping. A lengthy concrete driveway leads to the remote double garage with rear access perfect for storing extra cars or trailers ect and internal access to the house. The backyard is perfect for the entire family and pets. The entertaining aspect is completed with pergola for year-round use.
The Hunt Club is a multi award winning estate offering numerous parks, wetlands, walking and bicycle paths as well as a complete range of childcare, primary (Cranbourne East Primary) and secondary schools (Cranbourne East Secondary College). Buses weave through the estate making the newly built shopping centre complete with Woolworths & Aldi easily accessible. Recycled water, high speed broadband and environmentally friendly designs are all part of the estate.
Don't waste your time with a frustrating building process! It's all here waiting for you and you don't even need to lift a finger!
*PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*!

Description:
**SOLD BY DANIEL LOBLEY**
MAYFIELD ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: Almost brand new and designed with the perfect blend of style, space and easy living, this gem is the perfect opportunity for young families breaking into the market, investors looking to add to their portfolio and those looking to downsize!
Nestled in a very quiet location literally moments from the Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre, Casey Fields sporting precinct, Chisholm TAFE, Casey Grammar school and all of the facilities situated in the heart of Cranbourne, the home's position is undeniably good.
Fronted by a modern and instantly appealing rendered facade, 3 Cartwright Grove is beautifully presented and features a front formal lounge as well as an open plan family/dining area that incorporates the gorgeous all white hostess kitchen. Complete with stainless steel appliances, 40mm stone bench tops and a walk in pantry this area is one of the major selling features!
Accommodation is plentiful with 4 true bedrooms upstairs, all with mirrored sliding robes and double block out blinds. The master retreat offers a trendy ensuite that complements the equally as impressive family bathroom and additional downstairs powder room with teardrop vanity.
Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling balance Melbourne's unpredictable climate, whilst outside there's a remote double lock up garage with internal/rear roller door access plus a North facing yard that is perfectly easy to maintain!
Added extras include a wide entry with feature front door and stone bench tops throughout!
The location is A1 within moments to expansive parkland, a dog park, St. Thomas The Apostle primary school and local buses. Further afield you are also within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne.
With shopping precincts situated in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club, local amenities are always going to be close by. Don't forget about the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
If you want your family to have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation then call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!

Description:
Modern, Bright, & Exceptional Quality!
You will love coming home to your modern, contemporary family abode with its high ceilings, functional floor plan and warm and inviting atmosphere.
As you enter the home you are welcomed by an enormous lounge room, perfect for entertaining those important guests in. This leads through to the hostess kitchen which has stainless steel appliances, a dishwasher and stone benchtops, that overlooks the meals and family room as well as the enclosed backyard.
Offering three bedrooms; the master bedroom with a full en-suite and walk in robe whilst the remaining two bedrooms have built in cupboards. Further quality features include, evaporative cooling, ducted heating, a powder room downstairs, floorboards to downstairs and an open study upstairs that can be turned into a third living area or kids retreat, the options are endless.
The great outdoors comprises of a remote double garage and an easy to maintain backyard, a pergola to relax in to enjoy the summer nights.
Conveniently located and in walking distance to 3 schools, and minutes from shops and public transport.

Description:
Enter the hunt club – perfect location
Located in the heart of the Hunt Club, one of the most sort after estates of Cranbourne East is this beautiful 3 bedroom family home ideal for first home buyers and investors alike.
Freshly painted and offering three spacious bedrooms, master bedroom with full ensuite and walk in robe, built in robes in other bedrooms, open plan kitchen/living area.
Large decked pergola ideal for entertainment, additional features include ducted heating throughout, split system in kitchen/living area, ducted vacuum system and double remote garage with internal access.
Fantastic location with right opposite the park, as well as bus stops and walking/bicycle paths nearby. Less than 5 minutes walk to Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary School. The Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, Casey Race Aquatic Centre, Casey Fields Sporting Facilities and Casey Grammar School are close by as well.
Call now to book your own private inspection.

Description:
WALK TO THE SCHOOL. HUNT CLUB LOCATION
(218284) Have a look at this 3 bedroom beauty all with robes, the master has a full ensuite and walk in robe. We also have gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout the home ensuring year round comfort.
The home is carpeted to the bedrooms but with timber look flooring to the hardwearing areas and ceramic tiled to the wet areas. The kitchen is a treat with gas cooktop wall oven and dishwasher with plenty of bench space as well. We also have a tiled meals area.
The spacious lounge is ideal as it's designed for family living and leads out to a great pattern paved pergola patio area and the low maintenance gardens all on a feature packed 375m2 block.
The double garage has also a rear roller door that accesses through to another undercover area for a boat, trailer, a third car or whatever.
Inspections are by calling Frank Barrett direct. We are also open Sundays.

Look no further..
Growing family? Kids want their own rooms? Then No. 6 Greenglade Way located in the prestigious Mayfield Estate is the home for YOU! This modern, immaculate and visually stunning home boasts quality inclusions and a floor plan with ‘Family’ in mind.
• Offering 4 spacious bedrooms with BIR, master bedroom with full ensuite and walk-in-robe, 2 large living areas.
• Spacious entertainers kitchen with stainless steel appliances, oversized kitchen island with storage on both sides and built in dishwasher
• Outdoor you will find the perfectly designed front landscaping, concrete all around the house and a low maintenance backyard for the family to enjoy.
Other extras the property includes: Double garage with internal access, CCTV cameras, alarm, split system, ducted heating, downlights throughout, floating floors and carpeted bedrooms
When it comes to location this property has it. Nested in the sought after Mayfield Estate, you are a short drive from Shops, Cranbourne Town Centre, schools and childcare centres and parklands for the kids to enjoy.

Description:
**SOLD BY MATTHEW RINGERI**
HUNT CLUB ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: With this thriving location fast becoming a hub for value-focused first home buyers, investors and empty-nesters, this well maintained gem is sure to gain plenty of admirers!
Offering the perfect amount of space inside and out, 29 Stately Drive is set on a larger than average corner block measuring app. 600m2 and ensures that there is plenty of room for the kids and pets to play. Ideally located for those that don't want to rely on having to drive everywhere, the property is positioned directly opposite both Cranbourne East primary and secondary schools with The Hunt Club shopping village only moments away.
Beautifully maintained with plenty of potential for the lucky new purchasers to add their own personal touches, the home itself features an entry that leads directly to the main living quarters. The spacious family/meals zone is adjacent to the pristine kitchen boasting stainless steel appliances, whilst there are 4 genuine robed bedrooms. The master is complete with a walk-in wardrobe and a full ensuite that complements the family bathroom and second toilet.
Ducted heating is also included and will help to keep Melbourne's chilly winters at bay, whilst outside there's a remote double lock up garage with internal access, an under-roofline alfresco plus a huge backyard that is seldom available in most modern estates these days.
Within close proximity to picturesque wetlands and walking/bike paths, the Hunt Club is a multi-award winning development offering a complete range of education facilities, including a childcare centre. Buses constantly weave through the estate and don't forget the future plans for a Cranbourne East railway station!
Centrally located to freeways and public transport enroute to the Melbourne CBD, the location is second to none. For those of you who like to stay closer to home, it's only a brisk drive to the Cranbourne Park shopping centre, Berwick Village and Fountain Gate shopping precinct. Within close vicinity to an array of additional primary, secondary and tertiary institutions, the entire family will have easy access to the very best in entertainment, education and recreation!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Live Life King Size
Situated in the Parks Edge Estate. Modern Stylish and offering a great locale opposite parkland, close proximity to Casey sports complex, Casey Race - Recreation and Aquatic Centre, Shopping Centres, Schools.
This Porter Davis - Sandringham 45 is a quality home has many features. Comprising of 5 bedrooms, master with en-suite which has double vanity and 1500mm wide shower & large WIR. Most of the Bedrooms are huge with WIR. Gourmet Kitchen with huge island bench with Caesar stone bench tops with waterfall equipped with s/steel quality appliances, large walk in pantry with the convenience of the adjoining meals/ Family area and overlooking the large pergola area which is perfect for entertaining.
There is a separate lounge which is currently used as a theatre room and could be easily converted to 6th bedroom if required. Large activity area in the upper level. The extra wide double lock up garage has internal access. Large concrete driveway to park additional cars along with side access to park a caravan, boat or a trailer.
Other features include: Solar Panels, Refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, ducted vacuum landscaped gardens, fully rendered exterior, TV points in all bedrooms... plus lots more.
Inspect and see the difference this home has to offer and walk to everything.

Description:
Style & Class Is What It Is!!
Perfect for someone who is looking for a place that is modern, spacious, comfortable, low maintenance and close to all amenities
Property features:
- 3 bedrooms all with built in robes
- Central toilet and bath
- Additional toilet & shower
- Open plan living and meals
- Modern kitchen with stone bench top and plenty of cupboards
- Laundry area
- Lock up garage
- Air conditioning
Conveniently located and in walking distance to 3 schools, and minutes from shops and public transport, only 8 minutes to Cranbourne train station.
Don't miss this once in a while opportunity therefore you must call Vikram on 0430 393 918 now to inspect what this beauty of a home has to offer you.

Description:
Title block, build your dream home in Cranbourne East!!
New titled land released to build your dream luxurious home amongst the display homes in Cranbourne East. Make it yours today.
With a wide 14m Frontage x 30m Depth - 420m2 (approx)
Just a short drive 6 minutes to Cranbourne Train Station & bus stop, 6 minutes to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, 5 minutes to Royal Botanic Gardens and local primary and secondary schools near by.
Surrounded close to other recreation and sporting facilities for everyone like Cranbourne Racecourse, Cranbourne Swimming Pool and Casey Fields Tennis.
CALL Marie 0450 105 165 to inspect the land for further details. Section 32 is available on request.

Description:
A quality built family home
Look no further than this stunning, quality built family home in the sought after Livingston Estate on a generous 415sqm allotment. The home features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms- master with walk in robe and en suite
- Entertainers kitchen with stone island bench, walk in pantry and plenty of cupboard space
- 2 Separate living zones include formal lounge plus open plan family/meals area
- Extensive decked undercover outdoor area for all year round entertaining
Extra comforts include: double garage with internal access, ducted heating, cooling, downlights throughout, walk in linen press, quality blinds, low maintenance gardens and so much more! All of this within walking distance to quality schools, shops. Parks, public transport and Casey Race. This one is not to be missed- for your private inspection, call today!

Description:
A PERFECT DELIGHT FOR ALL BUYERS!
Cranbourne East, The Brindalee Estate: Good block size, prime location and a warm comfy house! The Brindalee Estate is located in the heart of Cranbourne East and is highly pursued among the property seekers.
This freshly renovated 3 bedroom house is ultimate. Set on a good sized block (544 sqm approx.) This is the dream of every family, investor and down sizer. The Master bedroom is spacious, with an Ensuite plus WIR. Additionally, a central bathroom caters to the other two bedrooms. All the bedrooms have built in robes and windows to fill up natural sunlight & calm breeze of air.
This spacious house has a formal lounge and additional family living/ dining area takes care of it all. The kitchen comes with plenty of bench top space and cupboard space, gas cook top, rangehood, etc.
The backyard offers loads of space to do plenty of recreational activities.
Features of the house:
- Brand New Carpets to Bedrooms
- Freshly Painted
- LED Down-lights
- 2 Living Areas
- 3 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms
- Master Bedroom with Ensuite & WIR
- Kitchen (Gas cooktop/ Range-hood, Storage cupboards, Dishwasher)
- Tiles to kitchen and bathrooms
- Well Maintained Front & Back Garden
- Garden Shed
- Heating
- Pergola with Concrete Flooring
- Double Garage With Internal Access
Chattels: All fittings and fixtures as inspected.
Deposit terms: 10% of the purchase price.
Preferred Settlement: 30/60/90 days.
The Location of the house is definitely enviable, Walk/ short drive facilities:
The Hunt Club Shopping Centre
Springhill Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre
Cranbourne Libraray
Casey RACE
Casey Grammar School
Cranbourne East Primary School
Carlisle Park Primary School
Child Care Centres
Medical Centres
Bus Stop/ Train Station
This excellent opportunity will soon be taken. Contact Hardeep Singh or Jas Singh to book an inspection time.
PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN HOMES
Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters.

Description:
Titled 387 SQM Land! Ready to build!
Set in the heart of Cranbourne East, the opportunity to build your dream family home is waiting for you. Right next to the prestigious Livingston Estate, it is surrounded by parklands and all the amenities the heart desires!
-Block size approx 387m2 with a frontage of approx 12.5 m
-Titled and ready to build
-East facing
-Close to shops and Medical facilities
-Established Primary and Secondary Schools nearby
-Close to Casey RACE, Casey Fields and Cranbourne racecourse
-Close to Cranbourne Shopping Complex
With less than 60 minutes from Melbourne CBD via South Eastern Freeway and 30 minutes to Port Phillip Bay, this is a fabulous opportunity not to be missed.
Call Lin Zhang on 0403 187 808 for further details.
